name: Utsab Barman
headline: Data Science, Machine Learning, NLP, Deep Learning, LLMs
summary:
As a Senior Data Scientist at Elsevier, I developed end-to-end machine learning solutions and services that leverage state-of-the-art deep learning models and the AWS platform. My role involves the entire process, from training and evaluating models to their deployment, using tools such as SageMaker. I have 5+ years of professional experience in data science, as well as multiple years in academic research, which have enabled me to acquire a solid foundation in machine learning, NLP, and project management.

I am responsible for working on projects from their inception to their delivery, collaborating closely with colleagues to define the scope and establish objectives and deliverables. I manage projects using JIRA, employing both KANBAN and Scrum methodologies. Some of the projects I have worked on include developing automated anti-money laundering solutions, decentralized NLP and ML modules, and explanatory equipment management systems. I have also contributed to several publications and a patent in the field of NLP and machine learning. I have excellent communication skills, which allow me to effectively explain complex concepts to non-technical stakeholders, and present findings in a clear and concise manner. I am excited to bring my unique blend of industry and academia to every endeavor I undertake, and to deliver actionable insights that drive informed decision-making and empower my team to achieve our technical goals.
